fields.description: The hour element of the time. Allowed values range from 0 (start of the selected day) to 24 (end of the selected day). Hour value 24 cannot be combined with any other minute value but 0.
fields.name: Hour

fields.description: The minute element of the time. Allowed values are 0 and 30. If not specified, its value defaults to 0.
fields.name: Minute
